data.decision: Tracking "Clarity (2-second before reading pass rate)" as the non-negotiable metric for Season 1
data.rationale: Clarity is the highest-leverage metric for design quality. If a user can't answer "what's the mood?" and "what's the main action?" in 2 seconds of blur, the design fails regardless of other qualities.
data.context: DURO Design OS Season 1 training program
